about_the_game:
Have you heard of the Goblin Queen who hoards gazillions of funds in her smelly underground palace?!!

She's real, she lives beneath Eldershire's High Street! Visit her, and if she finds you worthy, you'll get your hands on...

An UNLIMITED Supply of Coins and an UNLIMITED Supply of Elixir!!!


Perfect for Players who want to build and grow their garden without being constrained by their Coin & Elixir balance.
Also ideal for Achievement Hunters who want to reach 100% in an easier manner.

From this AWESOME DLC, you'll:

  • Get full access to the Goblin Queen's Throne Room
  • Hear entirely new dialogue from the fully-voiced Goblin Queen, played by the talented Emily Joann!
  • Receive an instantly collectable 500 Tokens upon finishing her quest, as well as FIVE Bonus Tokens for you to collect daily!
  • Not to mention the UNLIMITED Coins and UNLIMITED Elixir (can be toggled on & off in case you wish to return to a traditional way of playing)
  • And a bonus exclusive Wogglebogg Costume that was previously only available to Potion Commotion Founders.
  • A thank you note from the Developer

To find the Goblin Hideout (where the Goblin Queen lives), go to the City and head far to the left, you'll find the entrance conveniently located next to Jimmy the Stamp Dealer. You'll need to go here before getting your hands on those precious, precious treasures!

If you enjoyed Potion Commotion, then purchasing this DLC is a fantastic way to go the extra mile to help support the Developer's work on future updates and projects.

Become the richest Wizard's Gardener in the land by grabbing the 'Potion Commotion - Unlimited Funds' DLC today!
